subject: Pro X Pedal upgrade
description_text:
Hello
I purchased the original Pro X pedals in December of 24.   I see now there
are upgrades to this.  I purchased the upgrade kit from Amazon but it
doesn't appear to come with the new shorter break spring.   Can you let me
know what the size of that spring is?





Thanks

Brian Pinnow
769-8354

conversations.body_text: 你好，Brian Pinnow，  请拍一张升级套件的照片，以便我检查是否缺少任何部件。

Can you translate to English?

Brian Pinnow
608 769 8354


On Wed, Jun 18, 2025 at 3:59 AM support@simsonn.com

I have not received it yet, but the picture doesn't show the shorter break
spring, I just want to make sure its supposed to be included.

[image: image.png]
Brian Pinnow
769-8354


On Wed, Jun 18, 2025 at 3:59 AM support@simsonn.com

Hi Brian Pinnow,  Please provide a photo of the current spring on your ProX pedal. We can send you a replacement spring and adjust our connector accordingly. Apologies for the oversight—we forgot that the older version of the ProX doesn't use the short spring.
Hi Brian Pinnow,     Please don't worry, this spring will be included in the package.
